name: KaraCube
summary:
Karacube is an enigmatic approach on color theory. 
Change the color of your cubes to mix together colors of light rays matching their targets.  
 
Prepare for sophisticated puzzles that require you to activate rarely used parts of your brain. 
 
The game comes with 40 levels in ever growing difficulty to play totally free. 
Advanced players can use a level generator to customize and automatically build their own stages. 
 
Karacube was soft launched earlier on all mobile platforms and will soon go officially released with a PC/Mac/Linux port. 
 
Trailer & store links can be found @ http://www.karacube.com
